title: Forsaken Petal
description: In a world where magic and technology live in a fragile coexistance any change can disrupt the balance of power and send the world into chaos. Tom Alerio, a young boy, soon learns he is that change. Tom's mother comes from a long line of women who have wielded magic to protect the world and to help balance the powers. She realizes that she has passed this gift onto her son, Tom Alerio, and not willing to sacrifice another son sends him into the world alone at a young age. The sisterhood that she belongs to has never allowed a male child with the ability of magic to live.Many opposing groups materialize out of the wood works when they realize what Tom can do. Tom must decide which of those groups are there to help him and which are there to destroy him and the world he comes to love. One of those groups, The Forsaken Petal, want to help Tom restore magic to both women and men. Tom must restore the Order of The Rose and learn to believe in himself and Aithnea, an apprentice in the sisterhood. If Tom can't do this then the powers of magic and technology will collide, destroying everything.
author: Joshua D. Hoyt
